basics.name: Sachin S
basics.label: Security Researcher
basics.summary: Analyst with expertise in AI-driven Security, combining experience as a Freelance Penetration Tester and Operations Coordinator. Developed ML-based firewall and CNN-powered malware detection systems, showcasing strong skills in data analysis, machine learning, and security.

work.name: ATMEGA Software Technologies
work.summary: Managed daily operations and coordinated with project executives to streamline workflows and allocate tasks effectively.
highlights: Improved task delegation for the development team, enhancing efficiency
Ensured smooth workflow execution within a dynamic team environment

work.name: IP Security Labs
work.summary: Specialized in vulnerability assessments and implementing robust security measures for startups and non-profits.
highlights: Identified critical vulnerabilities, securing client systems against potential threats
Leveraged tools like Burp Suite, Metasploit, and Kali Linux to ensure comprehensive testing

courses: Programming in Python, R, and Java
Data Visualization using Tableau and SPSS

projects.name: AI-based Antivirus System
projects.description: Developing an AI-powered antivirus leveraging machine learning and NLP to intelligently detect and mitigate security threats.
highlights: Enhanced security through AI-driven threat detection
Analyzed patterns in network traffic and system activities for advanced threat prevention

projects.name: Machine Learning-Based Firewall
projects.description: Developed a CNN-powered firewall system to dynamically identify and block malicious traffic.
highlights: Integrated deep learning with real-time traffic monitoring

projects.name: Malware Detection using CNN
projects.description: Designed a CNN-based malware detection system, transforming binary files into image formats for accurate threat identification.
highlights: Leveraged Flask and TensorFlow for efficient implementation
Provided an innovative solution for enhanced malware detection

volunteer.summary: Organized cybersecurity awareness programs and training sessions for educational and corporate institutions.
Founded an international CTF team, hosting major events and participating in OSINT challenges.

certificates.name: Certified Ethical Hacker
certificates.summary: Currently working towards CEH Master certification (expected January 2025).
